data.actual_result: It has the "pinned messages" option. Idk if it's supposed to show all the pinned messages of the channels within the category but it doesn't do that either.
data.expected_result: It should not have the "pinned messages" option
data.short_description: "pinned messages" option appears when editing a category
data.steps_to_repro: - Create a new server or get manage channels permissions - Create a new category if none exist - Long press the category name - Hit "edit category" - Observe
